document.masterDocTitle: The species of Adelencyrtus Ashmead and Epitetracnemus Girault (Hymenoptera: Encyrtidae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The species of Adelencyrtus Ashmead and Epitetracnemus Girault (Hymenoptera: Encyrtidae) from China

Adelencyrtus mysorensis

subSubSection.paragraph:
Head. Frontovertex nearly 1 / 3 head width; ocelli arranged in an angle of about 60 º, posterior ocelli nearly touching inner eye margin, separated from occipital margin by 3 × its own diameter; antennal scape about 4 × as long as broad; pedicel about as long as combined length of F 1 −F 3 ; F 1 −F 3 slightly transverse, F 4 sometimes also transverse or subquadrate similar to F 4 and F 5 ; mandible quadridentate (
Hayat et al. 1975
, fig. 205 ).
Gaster. Ovipositor sheaths very slightly exserted, by about 1 / 7 gaster length.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 32−36. 32−36,
Adelencyrtus moderatus
, female: 32, antenna; 33, fore wing; 34, fore leg; 35, mid leg; 36, hind leg.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hosts.
Aspidiella hartii (Cockerell)
,
Aspidiella sacchari (Cockerell)
,
Aulacaspis takarai (Takahashi)
,
Aulacaspis tegalensis (Zehntner)
,
Duplachionaspis phragmitidis (Borchsenius)
,
Duplachionaspis
sp.,
Lepidosaphes
sp.,
Melanaspis glomerata (Green)
(
Williams 1970
;
Hayat et al. 1975
;
Hayat 1986
;
Trjapitzin 1989
;
Palaniswami 1991
;
Noyes & Hayat 1994
;
Noyes 2002
).

Type material examined.
GRENADA : Baltharzar (windward side), H.H. Smith ( lectotype Ψ of
A . moderatus
, BMNH ). JAPAN : Okinawa, Muyako Is., ex.
Aulacaspis takarai
,
5 .i. 1962
, coll. T. Miyara ( 2 ΨΨ paratypes of
A . miyarai
, BMNH ). INDIA : Gulbarga, Mysore,
18 .xi. 1967
, ex.
Duplachionaspis
? sp., on
Dichanthium annulatum , M. Hayat
( holotype Ψ of
A . mysorensis
, BMNH ).

Non-type material examined. CHINA : Fujian, Taining,
20 .xi. 2008
, coll. F. Yuan ( 1 Ψ). Guangxi, Daxin,
30 .iii. 1998
, C.D. Zhu ( 1 Ψ). Hainan, Bawang Ling,
12 .v. 2007
, L. Ding ( 2 ΨΨ); Five Finger Mt.,
12 .v. 2007
, Y .Z. Zhang ( 1 Ψ); Haikou,
23 .v. 2007
, L. Ding ( 2 ΨΨ).

Comments.
Noyes ( 1979 )
noted there is some variation in the dimensions of F 4 and coloration of coxae, which are not repeated here.
